name: ineffably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that causes so much emotion, especially pleasure, that it cannot be described: His music is ineffably beautiful. His voice was so ineffably sad that my eyes filled with tears. See
ineffable
More examplesFewer examplesThe middle section of the music is ineffably tender.The ambiguous endings to his novels are either ineffably poignant or maddeningly pointless. There's something ineffably smug and self-satisfied about the town.
